author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The Anbernic RG DS launched a surprise pre-order page for their upcoming RG DS handheld, so let's take a look and see if it is worth considering.

Pre-order here: https://tinyurl.com/RGDS-RGC
Non-affiliate: https://anbernic.com/products/rgds
Stylus video: https://youtu.be/BoYp30Meki0
DraStic custom shaders: https://github.com/jdgleaver/drastic_ds_shaders

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore
YT channel membership: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoZQiN0o7f36H7PaW4fVhFw/join
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/retrogamecorps
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

Timestamps:
00:00 introduction
01:34 specs and price
06:45 expected performance
11:57 screen discussion
15:55 hinge?
16:38 summary and conclusion

Find me on Discord! https://discord.gg/retrohandhelds

Theme song written by Jim Gray of Our Ghosts:
https://ourghosts.bandcamp.com/track/my-first-day-at-the-retro-game-cor
title: Some Thoughts on the Anbernic RG DS
